author: jerenkrantz
msg: (init_ssl_libraries): Call SSL_library_init() to make OpenSSL 0.9.8 happy.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * STATUS: Update URLs now that most stuff is converted to Google Code.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix up two buglets related to SSL.
(conn_setup): Set the app's ssl_ctx if we created it here.
(read_from_connection): Handle the EAGAIN case as our SSL handshakes also
cause the socket to be 'readable' when we haven't yet written anything.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow a timed-out connection to be handled gracefully.
(read_from_connection): Handle the case when we are ready to 'read', but
didn't write anything to deserve this response - it's likely we're about
to get an EOF due to a received FIN.
(process_connection): Handle POLLIN before POLLOUT so that if we're on a
dead connection - we don't write doomed requests, and stop processing
if we decide to reset the connection when reading.
